body:
@4ad the tests were all run on instances in the Joyent Public Cloud, base-64 is the name of their default basic 64-bit SmartOS image.  joyent_20151002T091442Z is [SmartOS Base Image v15.3.0](https://docs.joyent.com/public-cloud/instances/infrastructure/images/smartos/base#1530).  I can donate an instance for testing, if that helps.

EDIT: FWIW, I just rebuilt Consul with net/sendfile patched, and it now too works as expected.
